item.description: this time on a Friday night before memorial weekend, let's get together, play some euchre, bring a snack, a beverage of choice, relax with us, enjoy some laughs, be stupid with us (silly stupid), wild if you want, dance to some music during the game if you want, take forever to decide what trump should be, or be hard core and play as if you're home is being bet on it.  whatever- all are welcomed- serious players, fun players, old, young black white and grey.  doesn't matter.  just get your butt over to our house.  ;-)

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: Let's play some more EUCHRE!!
